hotels.title: Stylish Shizuoka Waterfront Escape on Lake Hamana with Onsen & Lakeside Pool
hotels.description: Experience waterfront relaxation at this modern hotel, elegantly positioned on the shores of Japan's serene Lake Hamana. Explore the local area's natural beauty, including the vibrant Hamanako Garden Park and incredible Flower Museum that's bursting with colourful blooms. After a day of exploring everything that the Shizuoka prefecture has to offer, savour exquisite buffet cuisine at La Sensoriel - the hotel's elegant restaurant - swim in the lakeside pool or head to the tranquil onsite spa and onsen for a rejuvenating soak.
